name: 2DPlatformer Tutorial
description:
This is my 2dPlatformer project.

It is playable for MacOS & Windows

The Modifications I plan on changing:

1.) Visual/audio

Reskin the existing graphics in some way or add additional  graphical elements to the game(such as change the player's or an enemy's look or change the player or an enemy to a completely different character).

edit enemies or environmental challenges to make new ones, complete with animated states.

Replace sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game.

2.)Gameplay

add more abilities for the player and edit enemies to show the use of such an ability

add more structure to level design and change/add UI elements

3.) Adding more levels with progressive structure from level to level

Menu changes -such as font, size, etc. (overall appeal)

Credits:

Created by Charles Morris
